content.prompt: The Gun-Free School Zones Act made it illegal for individuals knowingly to carry a gun in a school zone. The Supreme Court determined this act to be an unconstitutional stretch of the commerce clause in

choices.label: McCulloch v. Maryland (1819)
Citizens United v. Federal Election Commission (2010)
New York Times Company v. United States (1971)
United States v. Lopez (1995)

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe the facts, issue, holding, reasoning, decision and majority opinion of required Supreme Court cases.
